amendment.description: To strike the meals and refreshments exception for lobbyists.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2942 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2942 proposed by Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S1866, S1869-1870, S1871-1872; text: CR S1866) To strike the meals and refreshments exception for lobbyists.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2942 proposed by Senator Dodd.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2942 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
